      • getResultSpecification

        protected ResultSpecification getResultSpecification(Map<String,? extends Object> parameters,
                                                     int defaultOffset,
                                                     int defaultMaxCount)
        Get a result specification using the parameters offset and max count.
        Parameters:
        parameters - Map containing all parameters.
        defaultOffset - value to use if offset is unset
        defaultMaxCount - value to use if maxCount is unset
        Returns:
        The result specification initialized by the parameters
